thread.title: Watch: Gordon Ramsay Eats Cool Ranch Doritos Sushi With Jimmy Fallon & Questlove
thread.title_full: Watch: Gordon Ramsay Eats Cool Ranch Doritos Sushi With Jimmy Fallon & Questlove

author: Brenna Houck
title: Watch: Gordon Ramsay Eats Cool Ranch Doritos Sushi With Jimmy Fallon & Questlove
text: share Notoriously foul-mouthed celebrity chef Gordon Ramsay filled up a swear jar this week during an appearance The Tonight Show . Host Jimmy Fallon kicked off the interview by placing a stack of bills beside an enormous glass jar and warning Ramsay that he’d be filling it up throughout the show for charity. It doesn’t take long for the bills to pile up. In solidarity with many Americans today, the British chef will be watching the Super Bowl, though he may not be partaking in the annual tradition of consuming massive amounts of chicken wings. Ramsay seemed particularly appalled that Americans are expected to eat upwards of 1.8 billion chicken wings on Sunday. “How many f*cking chickens is that?” Backstage, the chef demonstrated his skills for creating new dishes on the fly with Recipe Roulette . By far the highlight of the evening was the game Secret Ingredient , in which Ramsay, Fallon, and The Roots’ Questlove attempted to guess mystery ingredients in a series of dishes including Cool Ranch Doritos sushi. Ramsay is clearly disgusted. Watch the whole clip above.
